授業方法:
This class will be conducted entirely face to face and in English. Students are expected to use English at all times in class. Class will be conducted as part lecture and part pair and group discussion and collaborative work. Students will work in pairs and groups, and will discuss their research topics, as well as effective ways to write a research paper. They will give peer feedback on presentations and writing assignments. Students will be required to complete self-study activities from the textbook and other sources that are not covered in class. Research and much of the writing will also be done out of class.
Active student interaction and participation is a strong expectation of this course.
